name: (Paper 4) Cambridge Key English Test (KET7) - Writing Course
intro: (Level B1-B2) Strengthen your writing skills for the Cambridge KET7 exam by practicing structured and concise responses to real-world situations. This course focuses on composing clear, well-organized emails, messages, and notes within a time limit. You will develop essential writing techniques such as responding to specific prompts, structuring ideas logically, and maintaining clarity in communication.
lessonNames: Write an email to Jem answering questions about the lost school bag in 25 to 35 words.
